projectInfo.name: nakedobjects
projectInfo.credits: This report contains data retrieved from the National Vulnerability Database: http://nvd.nist.gov

dependency.description: A library for instantiating Java objects

evidence.name: description
evidence.value: A library for instantiating Java objects

evidence.name: description
evidence.value: Types that extend and augment the Java Collections Framework.

vulnerability.name: CVE-2007-5615
vulnerability.cwe: CWE-94 Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
vulnerability.description: CRLF injection vulnerability in Mortbay Jetty before 6.1.6rc0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and conduct HTTP response splitting attacks via unspecified vectors.

vulnerability.name: CVE-2007-5614
vulnerability.description: Mortbay Jetty before 6.1.6rc1 does not properly handle "certain quote sequences" in HTML cookie parameters, which allows remote attackers to hijack browser sessions via unspecified vectors.

vulnerability.name: CVE-2007-5613
vulnerability.cwe: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
vulnerability.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dump Servlet in Mortbay Jetty before 6.1.6rc1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified parameters and cookies.

vulnerability.name: CVE-2007-0156
vulnerability.description: M-Core stores the database under the web document root, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request to db/uyelik.mdb.

vulnerability.name: CVE-2004-2381
vulnerability.description: HttpRequest.java in Jetty HTTP Server before 4.2.19 allows remote attackers to cause denial of service (memory usage and application crash) via HTTP requests with a large Content-Length.

vulnerability.name: CVE-2002-1178
vulnerability.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the CGIServlet for Jetty HTTP server before 4.1.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via ..\ (dot-dot backslash) sequences in an HTTP request to the cgi-bin directory.

reference.name: 20021002 wp-02-0011: Jetty CGIServlet Arbitrary Command Execution
